    • Constructor Detail

      • AtaxxMove

        public AtaxxMove()
        This constructor should be used only for generating an instance to access the fromString(Piece, String) method. E.g., it is used in ConsolePlayer. A move that is created using this constructor will have GameMove.piece equals to null, and thus cannot be executed.

      • AtaxxMove

        public AtaxxMove(int oriRow,
         int oriCol,
         int row,
         int col,
         Piece p)
        This constructor creates a movement from an initial position and a final position.
        Parameters:
        oriRow - the initial position row.
        oriCol - the initial position column.
        row - the final position row.
        col - the final position column.
        p - the piece corresponding to the player which is associated with this movement.

    • Method Detail

      • execute

        public void execute(Board board,
           java.util.List<Piece> pieces)
        Moves the piece from the original position to the final position, if the piece in that position is of the player associated with the movement.
        Specified by:
        execute in class GameMove
        Parameters:
        board - the board of the game
        pieces - the list of players
        Throws:
        a - GameError if the movement is not valid

      • isValidDist

        protected java.lang.Boolean isValidDist()
        Checks if the distance is valid for a move.
        Returns:
        true if a square of side 4 centered on the initialPosition contains the final position.

      • shortMove

        protected java.lang.Boolean shortMove()
        Checks if a move is short.
        Returns:
        true if a square of side 2 centered on the initialPosition contains the final position.

      • convert

        public void convert(Board b)
        Converts all the pieces surrounding another piece to this piece.
        Parameters:
        b - the board.

      • fromString

        public GameMove fromString(Piece p,
                  java.lang.String str)
        Generates a move from a string of the form: oriRow oriColumn row column.
        Specified by:
        fromString in class GameMove
        str - a string that represents a move.

        String que representa un movimiento.

        Returns:
        An instance of (a subclass of) GameMove that corresponds to the move as described by cmd.

        un objeto de (una subclase de) GameMove que se corresponde con el movimiento descrito por cmd.

      • createMove

        protected GameMove createMove(int originalRow,
                  int originalCol,
                  int row,
                  int col,
                  Piece p)
        Convenience method for creating a move. Calls the constructor.
        Parameters:
        oriRow - the initial position row.
        oriCol - the initial position column.
        row - the final position row.
        col - the final position column.
        p - the piece corresponding to the player which is associated with this movement.

      • help

        public java.lang.String help()
        Description copied from class: GameMove
        Generates a string that describes the move. It should describe the format supported by GameMove.fromString(Piece, String).

        Genera un string que describe el movimiento. Debe describir el formato soportado por GameMove.fromString(Piece, String).

        Specified by:
        help in class GameMove
        Returns:
        A help message.

        Mensaje de ayuda.
